Hi, I'm Brad Stemke

I am a web developer specializing in front-end technologies and languages. I am a team player who writes clean efficient code while striving to stay in tune with best practices.

My free time is usually spent out at an estate sale, having a burger, spending time with good friends, or driving somewhere new to explore. Those moments are often documented with my iPhone & Fuji Disposable cameras.

Available for hire!

I am currently looking to join a new team.
Do you value continued learning?
Does your team collaborate and work with designers to bring the clients vision to life in a user-friendly, responsive, and dynamic way?
Do best practices matter to you?
Do naming conventions for your CSS artitecture interest you?

If so, let's get in touch!
